alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, Gadsden, eastern Leon and south central Decatur Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida A And M, or near Tallahassee, moving northwest at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Woodville, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Greensboro, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Gretna, Lake Bradford, Douglas City, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Jamieson, Eight Mile Pond, Quincy Airport and Tallahassee Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
